  <script type="text/javascript">
   loadCSS('https://www.hsn.com/cassette.axd/stylesheet/4370e7b6e137b193e8f88c4276d811c6bf4508fb/site.css');
  </script>
  <script>
   document.domain = HsnDrdPageCache.getLowerDomain().substr(1);
  </script>
  <!-- Monetate ExpressTag Sync v8.1. -->
  <script>
   var monetateT = new Date().getTime();
  </script>
  <script src="//se.monetate.net/js/2/a-76efa35e/p/hsn.com/entry.js">
  </script>
  <!-- Brief:87332 -->
  <script>
   window.monetateQ = window.monetateQ || [];
monetateQ.push(['setCustomVariables', [{name: 'toCancelTracking', value: '1'}]]);

var monetateHsnFirstRun = true;

// inCats ( default empty ) - An Array of strings of 'categories' to pass along, basically flags, example 'device:isMobile'
window.MonetateHsn_ExecutePageView = function(inCats) {
	
	// Functions
	function gridGetProductIds() {
		var productIdList = $('#template-product-grid li.item.product-item, .mobile #template-product-grid div.item.product-item').map(function () {
			var ret = $(this).data('product-id');
			if (ret) {
				return ret.toString();
			}
		}).toArray();
		
		return productIdList;
	}
	
	// dataLayer extraction
	function dlGetFirst(arr) {
		var t = typeof arr;
		if ( t == 'string' || t == 'number' ) { return arr }
		if ( t == 'object' && arr && arr.length ) { return arr[0] }
		return '';
	}
	function dlGetFirstItem(key) { return dlGetFirst( HSN.DataLayer.getValueForKey( key ) ) }
	function dlGetItems(key) { var ret = HSN.DataLayer.getValueForKey( key ); if (!ret) { ret = [] }; return ret }
	function ifExistsToString(val) { if ( val ) { return val.toString(); } else { return val; } }
	
	
	// Cats / Info
	var cats = [];
	var DI = HSN.Instance().DeviceInformation;
	
	// Custom Cats for this call
	if ( inCats && inCats.length ) {
		for ( var x = 0 ; x < inCats.length ; x++ ) {
			cats.push( inCats[x] );
		}
	}
	
	// Device detection cats
	if ( DI.IsMobile )
		cats.push( 'device:isMobile' );
	if ( DI.IsTablet )
		cats.push( 'device:isTablet' );
	if ( DI.IsNativeApp )
		cats.push( 'device:isNativeApp' );
	
	if ( $("header#lessman, #content.lessman-page, #app-content.lessman-page").length )
		cats.push( 'subPageType:Lessman' );
	
	if ( $("#arcade-header, #mobile-arcade, body #gameContainer").length )
		cats.push( 'subPageType:Arcade' );
	
	// Page Type
	var pageType = dlGetFirstItem('page_type');
	
	if (typeof pageType === 'string' && pageType !== '') {
		pageType = pageType.replace(/ /g, '');
		window.monetateQ.push(['setPageType', pageType]);
	}
	
	
	// Metrics for specific pages / page types
	if (pageType == 'Grid' || pageType == 'Search') {
		window.monetateQ.push(['addProducts', gridGetProductIds()]);
		
		// Extra Granular to prevent migration issues
		if (monetateHsnFirstRun && HSN.Template.ProductGrid && HSN.Template.ProductGrid.EVENT) {
			var hsni = HSN.Instance();
			hsni.Events.On(HSN.Template.ProductGrid.EVENT.RELOADED, MonetateHsn_ExecutePageView );
			hsni.Events.On(HSN.Template.ProductGrid.EVENT.LOADEDMORE, MonetateHsn_ExecutePageView );
		}
	}
	
	if (pageType == 'Product') {
		window.monetateQ.push(["addProductDetails", [$("#webp_id").val()]]);
		
		if ( $("#template-product-detail .buy-selector .flexpay select").length )
			cats.push( 'feature:HasFlexpay' );
	}
	
	if (pageType == 'Checkout') {
		var orderID = ifExistsToString(dlGetFirstItem('order_id'));
		var productIDs = dlGetItems('product_id');
		var productQtys = dlGetItems('product_quantity');
		var productPrices = dlGetItems('product_sale_price');
		
		// Order Confirm Page - Will have no pageType set when this shouldn't run
		if (window.location.pathname == '/checkout/order-confirmation') {
			if (orderID && productIDs && productIDs.length) {
				var rows = [];
				
				for(x = 0; x < productIDs.length; x++) {
					rows.push({
						'purchaseId': orderID,
						'productId': productIDs[x].toString(),
						'quantity': productQtys[x].toString(),
						'unitPrice': productPrices[x].toString()
					});
				}
				
				window.monetateQ.push(['addPurchaseRows', rows]);
			}
		}
		
		// Bag Page
		if (window.location.pathname == '/checkout/bag') {
			if (productIDs && productIDs.length) {
				var rows = [];
				
				for(x = 0; x < productIDs.length; x++) {
					rows.push({
						'productId': productIDs[x].toString(),
						'quantity': productQtys[x].toString(),
						'unitPrice': productPrices[x].toString()
					});
				}
				
				window.monetateQ.push(['addCartRows', rows]);
			}
		}
	}
	
	window.monetateQ.push(['addCategories', cats]);
	
	// Fire
	window.monetateQ.push(['trackData']);
	
	if (monetateHsnFirstRun) {
		monetateHsnFirstRun = false;
	}
};

$(document).ready(function() {
	window.MonetateHsn_ExecutePageView();
});

// Fix auto suggest bug

$(document).ready(function() {
	$('#search-input').off('focus');
});
  </script>

  </style>

         </div>
        </div>
        <script>
         (function($){
        $("#primary-navigation").addClass("v3");
        
        if(jQuery('body').attr('id') === '_PageBody') {
            var head = document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0];
            var script = document.createElement('script');
            script.type = 'text/javascript';
            script.src = '/assets/js/HSN/Service/CommerceService.js';
            head.appendChild(script);
        }
        
        //load the logo gif on doc ready as requested
        $(document).ready(function(){
            //$('img.zLogoLarge').attr('src',$('img.zLogoLarge').data('src'));
        });
        
        // Dropdowns
        // Move the dropdowns outside of the logo container
        $(".hsn-logo-container").after( $(".zLogoNav") );
        
        // Add a new container to sticky nav, and copy utility nav into it
        var stickyUtilNav = $("<div class='sticky-utilitynav-container' />").append( $(".zLogoNav").clone() );
        
        $(".sticky-department-container").after(stickyUtilNav);
        
        function zDropdown(target, parentClass) {
            var _this = this;
            this.target = $(target);
            this.flyout = this.target.find(".zFlyout");
            this.timeout;
            
            this.touchHandler = function(e) {
                var cur = $(e.target);
                
                if (!cur.parents(parentClass).length) {
                    _this.hideFlyouts();
                    $(document).off("touchstart.zLogoNavRollovers");
                }
            }
            this.showFlyout = function() {
                _this.hideFlyouts();
                _this.flyout.show();
            }
            this.hideFlyouts = function() {
                $(parentClass + " .zFlyout").hide();
            }
            
            this.target
                .on("mouseenter", function(e) {
                    clearTimeout(_this.timeout);
                    _this.showFlyout();
                })
                .on("mouseleave", function(e) {
                    _this.timeout = setTimeout(function(){
                        _this.flyout.hide();
                    }, 250);
                })
                .on("touchstart", function(e) {
                    _this.target.off("mouseenter mouseleave");
                    
                    if ( !_this.flyout.is(":visible") ) {
                        e.preventDefault(); e.stopPropagation();
                        _this.showFlyout();
                        $(document).on("touchstart.zLogoNavRollovers", _this.touchHandler);
                    }
                })
            
            return this;
        }
        
        $(".zLogoNav").find(".zShop, .zWatch, .zConnect").each(function(){ new zDropdown(this, ".zLogoNav") });
        
    })(jQuery);
        </script>
       </div>

           <div class="left">
            <div class="hamburger-cell">
             <!-- Brief:100967 -->
             <style type="text/css">
              /* Fix for rogue semicolon */
  #primary-navigation #hamburger .left .hamburger-cell:first-child { font-size: 0px; }

  /* Leftover quick fixes */
  #primary-navigation { padding-top: 2px !important; }

  /* Styles to remove existing styles */
  #hamburger-open #hamburger-holder #hamburger { padding: 0px; }
  .zHamNav > ul > li { float: none !important; }

  /* Main Nav promos (text on right) */
  #primary-navigation .zHeaderPromo {
    margin: 0px 18px;
  }
  #primary-navigation .zHeaderPromo .zLink {
    display: block;
    font-size: 14px; line-height: 3.1em; font-family: IsidoraMedium, AvalonMedium;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    color: #333;
    text-decoration:none;
  }

  /* Main hamburger nav */
  #primary-navigation .zHamNav { width: 180px; }
  #primary-navigation .zHamNav > ul {}
  #primary-navigation .zHamNav > ul > li {
    width: 92%;
    padding: 0% 4%;
  }
  #primary-navigation .zHamNav > ul > li:hover {
    background-color: #0077c8;
  }
  #primary-navigation .zHamNav > ul > li > a {
    display: block;
    font-size: 16px; line-height: 2.3em; font-family: IsidoraMedium, AvalonBook;
    text-decoration: none;
    color: #333;
    margin-left: 3px;
  }
  #primary-navigation .zHamNav > ul > li:hover > a {
    color: #fff;
  }
  #primary-navigation .zHamNav .zSpacer {
    width: 100%; height: 0px;
    border-bottom: 1px dotted #ddd;
  }
  #primary-navigation .zHamNav > ul > li span.semi_ts {
    display: inline-block;
    color: #960051;
    font-family: isidorabold, avalonbold;
  }
  #primary-navigation .zHamNav > ul > li span.med_ts {
    display: inline-block;
    color: #960051;
    font-family: isidorabold, avalonbold;
  }
  
  #primary-navigation .zHeaderV4_Nav > ul > li span.med_ts, #primary-navigation .zHeaderV4_Nav > ul > li span.semi_ts {
    display:none; 
  }

  /* Main nav promos */
  #primary-navigation .zHamPromo { width: 180px; }

  /* Flyouts */
  #primary-navigation .zHamNavLinks { width: 600px; }
  #primary-navigation .zHamNavLinks.z4Col { width: 800px; }
  #primary-navigation .zHamNavLinks .zCol {
    width: 30%;
    padding: 1.6%;
    float: left;
  }
  #primary-navigation .zHamNavLinks.z4Col .zCol {
    width: 22.5%;
    padding: 1.2%;
  }
  #primary-navigation .zHamNavLinks .zHeaderDiv {
    position: relative;
    /*border-bottom: 1px solid #0077c8;*/
    margin: 20px 0px 5px 0px;
  }
  #primary-navigation .zHamNavLinks .zHeaderDiv:first-child { margin-top: 0px; }
  #primary-navigation .zHamNavLinks .zHeader {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 1.1em;
    font-family: IsidoraSemibold, AvalonDemi;
    color: #0077c8;
    margin-bottom: 9px;
    text-decoration:none;
  }
  #primary-navigation .zHamNavLinks a.zHeader::after,
  #primary-navigation .zHamShortcuts .zLink::after {
    content: "\20\003e";
    font-family: consolas, monospace;
    font-size: 1.3em;
  }
  #primary-navigation .zHeaderV3_Nav .zMoreLink a::after {
    content: "\003e";
    font-family: consolas, monospace;
    font-size: 1.3em;
    margin-left: 12px;
  }
  #primary-navigation .zHamNavLinks .zSeeAll {
    /*display: block;*/
    display: none;
    position: absolute;
    right: 0px; bottom: 9px;
    width: 25%;
    font-size: 12px; line-height: 1.4em; font-family: IsidoraMedium, AvalonBook;
    color: #0077c8;
  }
  #primary-navigation .zHamNavLinks .zLink {
    display: block;
    font-size: 14px; line-height: 2.14em; font-family: IsidoraMedium, AvalonBook;
    color: #333;
  }

  #primary-navigation .zHamNavLinks .zClear { clear: both; }

  /* Shortcut links */
  #primary-navigation .zHamShortcuts {
    width: 100%;
    margin-bottom: 5px;
  }
  #primary-navigation .zHamShortcuts .zCell {
    float: left;
  }
  #primary-navigation .zHamShortcuts .zTopBorder {
    width: 97%; height: 1px;
    margin: 10px 1.5% 10px 1.5%;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    /*border-top: 1px dotted #ccc;*/
    border-top: 1px solid #999;
  }
  #primary-navigation .zHamShortcuts .zLink {
    font-size: 14px; line-height: 2.4em; font-family: IsidoraMedium, AvalonMedium;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    color: #333;
    margin-right: 3px;
    text-decoration:none;
  }
  #primary-navigation .zHamShortcuts .zBull { display: none; margin-top: -2px; }

  #primary-navigation .zHamShortcuts .zClear { clear: both; }
  nav#primary-navigation.v4 .zHeaderV4_Nav li.mNew, nav#primary-navigation.v4 .zHeaderV4_Nav .zSpacer.mNew {display: none;}
  /* Flyout Promos */
  #primary-navigation .zHamStorePromo {
    margin: 8px 5px 2px 0px;
  }
  #primary-navigation .CarouselCard-Flyout { border-color: #999; }
  /* Community Fix */
  #lia-body #featured-nav > div {
    visibility: visible !important;
  }
  /* Hamburger padding */
  #hamburger-open #hamburger-holder #hamburger-storefront-flyout:not(:empty) { padding: 5px 0 !important; }
  #hamburger-open #hamburger-holder #hamburger-storefront-flyout:not(:empty) .bottom,
  #hamburger-open #hamburger-holder #hamburger-storefront-flyout:not(:empty) .top { padding: 0 5px !important; }
  nav#primary-navigation .sticky-navigation #hamburger-open #hamburger-holder .hamburger-cell li.dNew{display: none;}
             </style>

           nav#primary-navigation.v4 #utility-nav-parent {
	background: #0077c8;
}

	z-index: auto;
	height: 23px;
}

	background: #fff;
	padding: 0px;
	border-bottom: 1px solid #fefefe;
}

	margin: 0 0 2px 0;
	box-sizing: border-box;
	text-align: center;
}

	top: 65px;
	right: 0px;
}

	display: flex;
	align-items: center;
	justify-content: space-between;
	flex-wrap: wrap;
	float: none !important;
}

	display: inline-block;
	width: 88%;

}

	width: 9.5%;

	box-sizing: border-box;
}

}

/* Settings for 1280px */
@media only screen and (min-width: 1300px) {
	nav#primary-navigation.v4 #utility-nav,
	nav#primary-navigation.v4 .wrap,
	nav#primary-navigation.v4 #stores-nav #nav-content {
		width: 1280px;
	}
	nav#primary-navigation.v4 #featured-nav {
		padding: 11px 25px 0px 0px;
	}
	nav#primary-navigation.v4 #searchbar-v3 #search-form {
		width: 625px;
	}
	
	/* link revision v4 */
	nav#primary-navigation.v4 .zHeaderV4_Nav > ul::after {
		border-right: 1px solid #ccc;
	}
	nav#primary-navigation #stores-nav #nav-content #promo-cells #promo-cell-0 {
		width: 85%;
	}
	nav#primary-navigation #stores-nav #nav-content #promo-cells #promo-cell-4 {
		width: 12%;
		margin-right: 0.5%;
	}
	nav#primary-navigation.v4 .zHeaderV4_Nav a {
		font-size: 15px;
	}

	/* Sticky */
	nav#primary-navigation.v4 .sticky-navigation #searchbar-v3 #search-form {
		width: 595px;
		margin: 0px;
	}
	
	/* Community */
	.hsn-site-header nav#primary-navigation.v4 #stores-nav #nav-content {
		width: 1280px;
	}
	.hsn-site-header nav#primary-navigation.v4 .wrap {
		max-width: 1280px;
	}
	.hsn-site-header nav#primary-navigation.v4 #utility-nav-parent {
		max-width: none;
	}
	.hsn-site-header nav#primary-navigation.v4 #searchbar-v3 {
		padding: 0px
	}
	.hsn-site-header nav#primary-navigation.v4 #searchbar-v3 #search-form {
		width: 716px;
		margin: 15px 36px 10px 0;
	}
	
	/* Community Sticky */
	nav#primary-navigation.v4 .sticky-navigation .sticky-wrap {
		width: 1258px;
	}
	.hsn-site-header nav#primary-navigation.v4 .sticky-navigation #searchbar-v3 #search-form {
		width: 666px;
		margin: 0px 25px 0px 0px;
	}
}
          </style>
          <script>
           (function($) {
	// Clone menu items and flyouts from hamburger menu and alter them for v4 desktop use
	$('nav#primary-navigation').addClass('v4');
	
	// Flyout Container
	var zFlyoutsContainer = $('#hamburger-storefront-flyout').clone()
		.attr('id', '')
		.addClass('zHeaderV4_Flyouts')
		.hide();
	
	// Flyouts
	var zFlyouts = zFlyoutsContainer.find(' > ');
	
	zFlyouts.each(function(i, e) {
		var cur = $(e), id = cur.attr('id');
		//put a reader label on the original flyout cells
		$('#hamburger-storefront-flyout').find('#'+id)
			.attr('data-reader-label',id+' flyout');
		cur.attr('id', 'v4-' + id );
		cur.addClass('zFlyout');
	});
	
	//put the nav cells into their own promo cell before promo-cell-1
	$('<div id="promo-cell-0" />')
		.prependTo($('#stores-nav #nav-content #promo-cells'))
		//hamburger menu clone, put the reader label onto the existing hamburger menu links
		.append($('.zHamNav').parent()
				.attr('data-reader-label','storefront-nav-links').end()
			.clone().removeClass('zHamNav').addClass('zHeaderV4_Nav'));

	//put the flyout container into the nav-content container
	$('#stores-nav #nav-content').append(zFlyoutsContainer);

	function zDropdownNav(target, parent) {
		var _this = this;
		this.target = $(target);
		this.flyout = zFlyouts.filter('#v4-storefront-' + this.target.attr('data-marketing-id'));
		this.timeout;
		
		this.touchHandler = function(e) {
			var cur = $(e.target);
			
			if (!cur.parents(parent).length) {
				_this.hideFlyouts();
				$(document).off('touchstart.zHamNavRollovers');
			}
		}
		this.showFlyout = function() {
			// Reset
			zFlyoutsContainer.show();
			_this.hideFlyouts();
			zRollovers.removeClass('active');
			
			// Show new
			_this.flyout.show();
			_this.target.addClass('active')
			_this.positionFlyout();
		}
		this.hideFlyout = function() {
			_this.flyout.hide();
			_this.target.removeClass('active');
		}
		this.hideFlyouts = function() {
			$(parent + ' .zFlyout').hide();
			zRollovers.removeClass('active');
		}
		this.positionFlyout = function() {
			// Get left position of flyout, clamped to window size and page size
			var pos = this.target.position();
			var w = $(window);
			var wW = w.width();
			var targetWidth = (wW > 1300) ? 1280 : 986;
			var min = (wW - targetWidth) / 2;
			var max = targetWidth + min;
			
			var flyWidth = _this.flyout.width();
			max -= flyWidth;
			
			var left = (pos.left < min) ? min : (pos.left > max) ? max : pos.left;
			
			_this.flyout.css('left', parseInt(left));
		}
		
		this.target
			.on('mouseenter', function(e) {
				clearTimeout(_this.timeout);
				_this.showFlyout();
			})
			.on('mouseleave', function(e) {
				_this.timeout = setTimeout( _this.hideFlyout, 250 );
			})
			.on('touchstart', function(e) {
				// Remove mouse events
				_this.target.off('mouseenter mouseleave');
				_this.flyout.off('mouseenter mouseleave');
				
				if (_this.target.is('.zMoreLink'))
					return;
				
				if ( _this.flyout.length && !_this.flyout.is(':visible') ) {
					e.preventDefault(); e.stopPropagation();
					_this.showFlyout();
					$(document).on('touchstart.zHamNavRollovers', _this.touchHandler);
				}
			})
		
		this.flyout
			.on('mouseenter', function(e) {
				clearTimeout(_this.timeout);
			})
			.on('mouseleave', function(e) {
				_this.timeout = setTimeout( _this.hideFlyout, 250 );
			})
		
		return this;
	}
	
	var zRollovers = $('.zHeaderV4_Nav > ul > li');
	zRollovers.each(function(){ new zDropdownNav(this, '#nav-content') });
	//---------- end nav ----------
})(jQuery);
          </script>
         </div>
         <div id="promo-cell-2">
          <!-- Brief:71413 -->
          <!-- -->
         </div>

#primary-navigation #todayspecial .zMed { font-family: isidorabold, avalonbold; }

#primary-navigation #todayspecial .zLink .zDemi {
	display: block;
}

	text-transform: none;
	letter-spacing: .025em;

		margin: 7px 0px 7px 20px;

          <div class="zHeaderPromo" id="todayspecial">
           <a class="zLink" href="/todays-special" manual_cm_re="header-_-promo-_-ts" manual_cm_sp="header-_-promo-_-ts">
            <span class="zDemi">
             today's
            </span>
            <span class="zMed">
             special
            </span>
           </a>

          <input class="hDate" type="hidden" value=""/>
          <script>
           jQuery(document).ready(function($) {
	var noAjax = $('input#header-noajax').length > 0 ? $('input#header-noajax').val() : false;
	
	if (!noAjax)
	{
		var __ACstatus = function(data){
			var _d = new Date(data.serverTime);
			// Put data in .hDate for others to use
			$('.hDate').val(data.serverTime).data('utc',_d.getTime());
			delete _d;
			$("#todayspecial.zHeaderPromo .zText").show();
			//mark page as int
			(!!data.IsInternalRequest && $('html').addClass('is-int'));
		};
		if (HSN.OnAccountStatusLoad)
		{
			// 082416 - After Release this will be default
			HSN.OnAccountStatusLoad(__ACstatus);
		}
		else
		{
			HSN.Instance().Events.On(HSN.AccountNavigation.EVENT.ACCOUNT_STATUS_COMPLETE, __ACstatus);
		}
	}
	
	if (window.HSN && HSN.Instance && HSN.Instance() && HSN.Instance().FlyoutManager) {
		// Find existing TS flyout, and annihilate it
		$(HSN.Instance().FlyoutManager.Flyouts).each(function(){
			if (this.Url == "/headerfooter/todaysspecial")
				this.RemoveHandlers()
		})
	}
});
          </script>

      <style>
       body {
		overflow: hidden;
	}
	.cms-cell, 
	.cms-cell.full, 
	.cms-cell.empty, 
	.cms-cell.first, 
	.cms-cell.last {
		margin: 0 !important;
		padding: 0 !important;
		background: rgba(255,255,255,1);
	}
	#torso {
    	padding-bottom: 0px !important;
	}
	body:not(.mobile) #torso .wrap {
		width: 960px;
	}
	body:not(.mobile) .cms-cell:not(empty) {
		margin: 0 0 40px !important;
	}
	body:not(.mobile) .cms-cell[data-zone="ScriptCell"],
	body:not(.mobile) .cms-cell[data-zone="BigDeals"]:not(empty),
	body:not(.mobile) .cms-cell[data-zone="PromoHeading"]:not(empty),
	body:not(.mobile) .cms-cell.noop {
		margin: 0 !important;
	}
	@media screen and (min-width: 1300px) {
		body:not(.mobile) #torso .wrap {
			width: 1280px;
		}
		body:not(.mobile) .cms-cell:not(empty) {
			margin: 0 0 60px !important;
		}
	}
	.mobile #content {
		background: rgba(255,255,255,1);
	}
	.mobile .cms-cell:not(empty) {
		margin: 0 0 20px !important;
	}
	.mobile .cms-cell[data-zone="Unknown"],
	.mobile .cms-cell[data-zone="ScriptCell"],
	.mobile .cms-cell[data-zone="IP_HP_Banner1"],
	.mobile .cms-cell[data-zone="PromoHeading"]:not(empty) {
		margin: 0 !important;
	}
	.mobile ._mosaic__mc {
    	padding: 0 !important;
	}
	.cms-cell h1, 
	.cms-cell h2, 
	.cms-cell h3, 
	.cms-cell h4, 
	.cms-cell h5, 
	.cms-cell h6, 
	.cms-cell p, 
	.cms-cell a,
	.cms-cell ul, 
	.cms-cell ol, 
	.cms-cell li, 
	.cms-cell span, 
	.cms-cell img, 
	.cms-cell input, 
	.cms-cell textarea {
		margin: 0;
		padding: 0;
		border: 0;
		float: none; 
		line-height: 1.3;
		letter-spacing: .025em;
		-webkit-margin-start: 0;
		-webkit-margin-end: 0;
		-webkit-margin-after: 0;
		-webkit-margin-before: 0;
		outline-color: transparent;
		-webkit-font-smoothing: auto;
		-moz-osx-font-smoothing: auto;
	}
	
	/* LINE BREAK TAG CSS */
	line-break { display: inline; }
	line-break::before { content:"\00a0\200b"; }
	line-break.all,
	body:not(.mobile):not(.appTablet) line-break.d,
	.mobile line-break.m,
	.appTablet line-break.at,
	body:not(.mobile) line-break.nw { display: block; }
	line-break.all::before,
	body:not(.mobile):not(.appTablet) line-break.d::before,
	.mobile line-break.m::before,
	.appTablet line-break.at::before,
	body:not(.mobile) line-break.nw::before { content:""; }
	@media only screen and (min-width: 1300px) {
		body:not(.mobile):not(.ts-email) line-break.nw { display: inline; }
		body:not(.mobile):not(.ts-email) line-break.nw::before { content:"\00a0\200b"; }
		body:not(.mobile):not(.ts-email) line-break.w { display: block; }
		body:not(.mobile):not(.ts-email) line-break.w::before { content:""; }
	}
	
	.mobile .cms-cell[data-zone^="Feature"] .__hpFeaturePromo2019 .__FeaturePromoContainer .__FeaturePromoCopy span:last-child {
		font-size: 4.375vw !important;
	}
	.mobile ._autoTS {
    	margin: 0 !important;
	}

		padding-bottom: 0px !important;

      <div br="101028" class="TSWidget _autoTS generic" u="DG46374">
       <div class="_in">
        <a class="pd-modal" g="1" href="/todays-special" manual_cm_re="tsbillboard-_-TS-_-product9757951" t="reg">
         <div class="_img">
          <img alt="HSN's Today's Special. a pedaling exercise machine" class="_dt" g="2" src="//i01.hsncdn.com/tablet/DG46374_img_d.jpg?v=7" t="reg"/>
          <img alt="HSN's Today's Special. a pedaling exercise machine" class="_mb" g="3" src="//i02.hsncdn.com/desktop/DG46374_bg_m.jpg?v=7" t="reg"/>
         </div>
         <span class="_webPID" g="4" t="cl1">
          9757951
         </span>
        </a>
        <div class="_promo">
         <a class="pd-modal" href="/todays-special">
          <div class="_info">
           <div class="_desc">
            <span class="tl">
            </span>
            <span class="price">
            </span>
            <span class="flex">
             FlexPay available
            </span>
            <span class="note">
            </span>
           </div>
          </div>
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <script>
       (function($){
		var _tsInit = function(){
			var isMobile = !!$('body').is('.mobile'),
				isApp = !!$('body').is('.appPhone,.appTablet'),
				//sold out copy etc
				_soldout = {
					copy:'SEE ALL OUR TOP DEALS<span>Hurry - good things come to those who shop fast.</span>',
					cm: 'features-_-tswidget-_-shopdeals',
					href: '/shop/deals/dc'
				},
				//topline sold out copy
				_tlso = {
					copy:'<span>SOLD OUT</span>'
				},
				//get the parent container
				parent = $('._autoTS'),
				//get the item container
				container = $('._autoTS ._in ._promo'),
				//get the Web PID from the CMS drop down
				prodId = $('._autoTS ._in ._webPID').text(),
				//soldout
				debug = {
					//forcing multi items
					mt:(/(&|\?)tsm=[1-9]+/i).test(window.location.search),
					//forcing sold out
					so:(/(&|\?)tsso=[1-9]+/i).test(window.location.search),
					//forcing sold out on even items
					so2:(/(&|\?)tsso=2/i).test(window.location.search),
					//forcing not sold out
					nso:(/(&|\?)tsnso=[1-9]+/i).test(window.location.search)
				},
				tsemail = {
					//if this is the ts email page
					is:(/\/content\/.*\/333/i).test(window.location.pathname),
					//the link to use for the ts email page
					href:'/shop/todaysspecial/6198'
				},
				//ajax request data
				data = {},
				init = function(){
					if((/preview_dt=/i).test(window.location.search)){
						data.preview_dt = decodeURIComponent(window.location.search.replace(/(.*)(preview_dt=)([^%+]+)(.*)/i,'$3').replace(/\//g,'-'));
					}
					
					//get items
					$(document).ready(function(){
						_doAjax();
					});
				},
			
				//build the carousel
				_doAjax = function(){
					$.ajax({
						url: '/api/product/detail/'+prodId,
						type:'GET',
						data:data,
						beforeSend: function (xhr) {
							xhr.setRequestHeader('X-Requested-With', { toString: function() { return ''; } } );
						},
						success: function(data){
	
							var id = data.Id;
							var topline = data.Name;
							var price = data.Pricing.Tier1;
							var url = data.ProductLink.Uri.replace(/http(s)*:\/\/.*hsn\.(com|net)/,'');
							var cm = 'TSBillboard-_-TS-_-product'+id;
							var shipping = data.PricingDetail.ShippingAndHandlingLabel;
							
							$('._autoTS ._in').find('a')
									.removeClass('native-link')
									//.attr('href',url)
									.attr('manual_cm_re',cm)
									.attr('data-product-id',id);
							$('._autoTS ._in a').find('.tl').html(topline);
							$('._autoTS ._in a').find('.price').html(price);
							if (data.PricingDetail.PaymentOptions.length > 0){
								do{var Flexcheck = data.PricingDetail.PaymentOptions.pop();}
								while(!!Flexcheck.IsExtraFlex)
								$('._autoTS ._in a').find('.flex').html(Flexcheck.Number +' FlexPay available');
							}						
							var exclspan = $('<span>').addClass('_excl');
							$('._autoTS ._in a span.tl').prepend(exclspan);
							var callout = data.Callouts.filter(function(o){return o.Type.match('HsnExclusive')})[0];
							if (typeof callout != 'undefined'){
								exclspan.html('Exclusive! ');
							}
							else {
								callout = data.Callouts.filter(function(o){return o.Type.match('HsnNew')})[0];
								if (typeof callout != 'undefined'){
								exclspan.html('New! ');
								}
							}
							
							if(shipping != null || shipping != undefined) {
								$('._autoTS ._in a').find('.note').html(('|&nbsp;&nbsp;<span>'+shipping+'</span>') || '');
								$('.mobile ._autoTS ._in a').find('.note').html(('|&nbsp;<span>'+shipping+'</span>') || '');
							} else {
								$('._autoTS ._in a').find('.note').hide();
							}
	
						}
							
					});
					
					//handle relative to absolute links on apps
					if(!!isApp){
						HSN.Instance().ConvertLinks();
					}
				}
			//fire init
			init();
		};
		//start the process
		_tsInit();
	})(jQuery);
      </script>
     </div>
     <div class="cms-cell-nopad first full" data-zone="Zone23" style="width:100.00000000000000000000000000%;">
      <!-- Brief:0- -->
     </div>

      <!-- Brief:91835 -->
      <style>
       /* HP Feature/Promo Universal Widget CSS */
.cms-cell[data-zone^="Feature"] .__hpFeaturePromo2019 {

	margin: 0 !important;

}

	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	top: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0; left: 0;
}

	width: 100%;

	font-family: isidoramedium;
	display: block;
}

}

	font-size: 36px;
	display: block;
}

	font-family: isidorasemibold;
	font-size: 17px;
	display: inline-block;
	border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(0,48,78,1);
	line-height: 1;
	letter-spacing: .05em;
}
.cms-cell[data-zone^="Promo"] .__hpFeaturePromo2019 {
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	box-sizing: border-box;
	background: rgba(255,255,255,1);
}
.cms-cell[data-zone^="Promo"] .__hpFeaturePromo2019 {
	padding: 0 16px;
	margin: 0;
}
.cms-cell[data-zone^="Promo"] .__hpFeaturePromo2019 .__FeaturePromoContainer a {
	position: absolute;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	top: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0; left: 0;
	z-index: 9;
}
.cms-cell[data-zone^="Promo"] .__hpFeaturePromo2019 .__FeaturePromoContainer img {
	width: 100%;
}
.cms-cell[data-zone^="Promo"] .__hpFeaturePromo2019 .__FeaturePromoContainer .__FeaturePromoCopy {
    padding: 12px 0 12px 4px;
	color: rgba(0,48,78,1);
}
.cms-cell[data-zone^="Promo"] .__hpFeaturePromo2019 .__FeaturePromoContainer .__FeaturePromoCopy span:first-child {
	font-family: isidorabold;
	font-size: 27px;
	display: block;
}

._mosaic__mc ._mosaic__sc.__four ._contentstory:nth-child(4),

	margin-right: 0 !important;
}
._mosaic__mc ._mosaic__sc ._contentstory .__child {
	text-align: left;
}
._mosaic__mc ._mosaic__sc ._contentstory .__child img {
	width: 100%;
	background: rgba(204,204,204,1);
}
._mosaic__mc ._mosaic__sc ._contentstory .__child .__promo {
	padding: 9px 0 12px;
	max-height: 72px;
}

	color: rgba(0,48,78,1);
	font-family: IsidoraMedium;
	font-size: 17px;
	line-height: 1.3;
	margin: 0 0 4px;
	display: block;
	letter-spacing: .025em;
}

	font-size: 17px;
	font-family: IsidoraSemibold;
	border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(0,48,78,1);
	display: inline-block;
}

    margin: 8px 8px 22px;
}

	display: none;
}

	padding: 0;
}

	display: none !important;
}

	opacity: 0;
	visibility: hidden;
	padding: 0;
}

	float: none;
	clear: both;
}

      <script>
       // AUTO CHANGE MOSAIC LAYOUT
	(function(){
	var items = $("._mosaic__mc:not(.done)");
	
	items.each(function(i, item) {
		var cur = $(item);
		cur.addClass('done');
		
		var mc = cur.find('._mosaic__sc');
		var cs4 = cur.find('._cs4');
		var cs5 = cur.find('._cs5');
		var img4 = cur.find('._img4').attr('src');
		var img5 = cur.find('._img5').attr('src');
		var link4 = cur.find('._link4').attr('t');
		var link5 = cur.find('._link5').attr('t');
		var lockup = cur.find('.__lockup').attr('src');
		var header = cur.find('.__header');
		
		if (img4 === undefined || img4 === "" || link4 === "nope" || link4 === "") {
			cs4.addClass('__remove');
			cs5.addClass('__remove');
		} else {
			mc.removeClass('__three');
			mc.addClass('__four');
		}
		if (img5 === undefined || img5 === "" || link5 === "nope" || link5 === "") {
			cs5.addClass('__remove');
		} else {
			mc.removeClass('__four');
			mc.addClass('__five');
		}
		if (lockup === "" || lockup === "undefined" ) {
			header.removeClass('__alt');
		} else {
			header.addClass('__alt');
		}
		if (Math.abs(window.orientation) === 90) {
	    	mc.removeClass('_portrait');
			mc.addClass('_landscape');
		} else {
			mc.addClass('_portrait');
			mc.removeClass('_landscape');
		}
	});
	}());
	
	// AUTO ADJUST PADDING FOR MISSING COPY
	$('._copy:empty').each(function(){
	$(this).siblings('._link').addClass('_adjust');
	$(this).closest('.__promo').addClass('_adjust');
	});
	
	// TABLET ORIENTATION CHANGE AFTER INITIAL LOAD
	function readDeviceOrientation() {
	if (Math.abs(window.orientation) === 90) {
	    	$('._mosaic__sc').removeClass('_portrait');
		$('._mosaic__sc').addClass('_landscape');
	} else {
		$('._mosaic__sc').addClass('_portrait');
		$('._mosaic__sc').removeClass('_landscape');
	}
	}
	
	window.onorientationchange = readDeviceOrientation;
      </script>
     </div>
     <div class="cms-cell first full" data-zone="BigDeals" style="width:100.00000000000000000000000000%;">

		font-size: 19px;
		color: rgba(102,102,102,1);
	}
	._big-deals ._carousel a.product-detail-modal:not(._range) ._price::before {
		content: '';
		height: 0;
	}
	._big-deals ._carousel a.product-detail-modal > span._price span._t1 {
		color: rgba(206,0,55,1);
		display: inline-block;
	}
	._big-deals ._carousel a.product-detail-modal > span._price span._t2 {
		text-decoration: line-through;
		display: inline-block;
	}
	._big-deals ._carousel a.product-detail-modal._range > span._price span._t1,
	._big-deals ._carousel a.product-detail-modal._range > span._price span._t2 {
    	font-size: 15px;
    	margin-right: 12px;
    	font-weight: bolder;
	}
	@media screen and (min-width: 1300px) {
		._big-deals ._carousel a.product-detail-modal._range > span._price span._t1,
		._big-deals ._carousel a.product-detail-modal._range > span._price span._t2,
		._big-deals ._inner ._col-333 span._promotion {
			font-size: 19px;
		}
	}
	/*arrows*/
	._big-deals .slick-arrow {
		position: absolute;
		top: 40%;
		right: 8px;
		width: 36px;
		height: 36px;
		background-color: rgba(0,48,78,1);
		border-radius: 50%;
		background-image: none;
		z-index: 50;
		cursor: pointer;
		border: none;
		font-size: 0;
		outline-color: transparent;
	}
	._big-deals .slick-prev { 
		right: auto; 
		left: 8px; 
	}
	._big-deals .slick-arrow::after {
		content: "";
		position: absolute;
		top: 11px;
		left: 13px;
		border-left: 3px solid rgba(255,255,255,1);
		border-top: 3px solid rgba(255,255,255,1);
		display: block;
		width: 12px;
		height: 12px;
		transform: rotate(-45deg);
		-webkit-transform: rotate(-45deg);
		-ms-transform: rotate(315deg);
	}
	._big-deals .slick-next::after {
		border-left: none !important;
		left: auto;
		right: 13px;
		border-right: 3px solid rgba(255,255,255,1);
		border-top: 3px solid rgba(255,255,255,1);
		transform: rotate(45deg);
		-webkit-transform: rotate(45deg);
		-ms-transform: rotate(45deg);
	}
	
	/* pager */
	._big-deals ._pager {
		display: none;
	}
	._big-deals ._pager ul { margin: 0; padding: 0; }
	._big-deals ._pager li { display: inline-block; cursor: pointer; }

		height: 10px;
		width: 10px;
		background-color: #ccc;

	}

			top: 41.6%;

      <section br="87681" class="_big-deals" u="DG00000">
       <div class="_inner">
        <div class="_mobile_only">
         <img alt="dotted background" src="https://img.hsni.com/images/prod/2019_rebrand/homepage/svg/bigdeal_dotstrip_mobile.svg"/>
        </div>
        <div class="_col-333">
         <img alt="HSN Big Deals desktop lockup" class="_dt" g="1" src="https://img.hsni.com/images/prod/2019_rebrand/homepage/svg/bigdeals_desktop.svg?v=9" t="reg"/>
         <img alt="HSN Big Deals mobile lockup" class="_mb" g="2" src="https://img.hsni.com/images/prod/2019_rebrand/homepage/svg/bigdeals_mobile.svg?v=9" t="reg"/>
         <span class="_title" g="1" t="cl1">
          <span>
          </span>
         </span>
         <span class="_subtitle" g="1" t="cl2">
         </span>
         <span class="_promotion" g="1" t="cl3">
          Click and be quick. These special offers won't last long.
         </span>
         <a class="_shopdeals" g="1" href="/shop/sale/5544" t="reg">
          Shop today's best deals
         </a>
        </div>
        <div class="_col-666">
         <div class="_bigdeal-carousel">
          <div class="_pager">
          </div>
          <div class="_controls">
          </div>
          <div class="_carousel">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <a class="_shopdeals _mobile_only" g="3" href="/shop/sale/5544" manual_cm_re="banner-_-hp-_-bigdeals" t="reg">
         Shop today's best deals
        </a>
       </div>
      </section>
      <script>
       (function($){
		var _hiInit = function(){
			var isMobile = !!$('body').is('.mobile'),
				opt = {
					itemCount: (!!isMobile && 24) || 24,
					slides: (!!isMobile && 1) || 2,
				},
				element = $('._big-deals'),
				carousel = element.find('._carousel'),
				pager = element.find('._pager')
				init = function(){
					$(document).ready(function(){
						//get the hot items from the attribute
						doAjax('/api/product/list/8413',{take:opt.itemCount+1},function(data,ts,xhr){
							var obj = {
								url:'',
								topline: '',
								total: 0,
								recipe:(!!isMobile && 'prodfull') || 'prodfull',
								hasFlag: false,
								mod: 0
							};
							$.each(data.Products.Products, function(i,v) {
								// if the item has a flag in the data object
								obj.hasFlag = (typeof(v.Flag) != 'undefined');
								//-skip the TS
								if((obj.total >= opt.itemCount)
									|| (!!obj.hasFlag && !!v.Flag.IsTodaysSpecial)
									|| (/image-coming-soon/i).test(v.ImageLink.Uri)){
									return 1;
								}
								//increment
								obj.total++;
	
								//replace any nbsp in the topline with a space and encode double quotes
								obj.topline = (v.TopLine || '').replace(/\s/g,' ').replace(/"/g,'&quot;');
								//convert to relative url
								obj.url = v.ProductLink.Uri.replace(/http(s)*:\/\/.*hsn\.(com|net)/,'');
								//if this is a price range
								obj.priceClass = ((!!(/\s/).test(v.Pricing.Tier1)
									//&& typeof(v.Pricing.Tier2) != 'undefined'
									&& ' _range') || '');
								
								//create the item
								$('<a class="product-detail-modal'+obj.priceClass+'" href="'+obj.url+'" '
											+'manual_cm_re="recommendations-_-bigdeals-_-product_'+v.Identity+'" '
											+'manual_cm_sp="recommendations-_-bigdeals-_-product_'+v.Identity+'" '
											+'data-preview-url="'+obj.url+'" '
											+'data-product-id="'+v.Identity+'">'
										+'<span class="_img">'
											+'<img src="'+v.ImageLink.Uri.replace("#RECIPE#", obj.recipe)+'" alt="'+obj.topline+'" title="'+obj.topline+'">'
										+'</span>'
										+'<span class="_copy'+((!!obj.hasFlag && (' '+v.Flag.ClassName)) || '')+'">'
												+((!!obj.hasFlag && v.Flag.Name) || '&nbsp;')
										+'</span>'
										+'<span class="_price">'
											+'<span class="_t1">'+v.Pricing.Tier1+'</span>'
											//if there is a tier2 price, add it
											+((typeof(v.Pricing.Tier2) != 'undefined'
												//add nbsp between the prices if this is not a range
												&& ((obj.priceClass == '' && '&nbsp;&nbsp;') || '')
													+'<span class="_t2">'+v.Pricing.Tier2+'</span>') || '')
											//removed cta
											//+'<span class="_cta">BUY NOW</span>'
										+'</span>'
									+'</a>')
									.appendTo(carousel);
							});//ajax
							doCarousel();
						});
					});
				},
			
				doAjax = function(url,data,callback){
					$.ajax({
						url: url,
						type: 'GET',
						data: (data || {}),
						beforeSend: function (xhr) {
							xhr.setRequestHeader('X-Requested-With', { toString: function() { return ''; } } );
						},
						success: callback || (function(){}),
						error: function(ts){ window.console && window.console.error('>>> hi doAjax error:'); window.console && window.console.debug(ts); }
					});
				},
				doCarousel = function(){
					window._hiCC = carousel
						.on('beforeChange._hi', function(event, slick, 
								currentSlide, nextSlide){
							//workaround for slick clone data-lazy issue
							//if we are wrapping around to the first slide again
							if(nextSlide == 0){
								//get the img src of that slide
								$.each($(slick.$slides[nextSlide]).add($(slick.$slides[nextSlide]).nextUntil('[data-slick-index="'+slick.options.slidesToScroll+'"]')).find('[src]'),function(i,v){
									//get the src of the img
									var src = $(v).attr('src');
									//find the clone that has that img and set src, remove extra attrs
									$(slick.$slider)
										.find('.slick-cloned [data-lazy="'+src+'"]')
										.attr('src',src)
										.removeAttr('data-lazy data-srcset data-sizes');
								});
								//stop firing the beforechange event
								$(slick.$slider).off('beforeChange._hi');
							}
						})
						.slick({
							slidesToShow: opt.slides,
							slidesToScroll: opt.slides,
							appendArrows: '._big-deals ._controls',
							dots: true,
							appendDots: '._big-deals ._pager',
							dotsClass: 'pager-dots',
							infinite: true,
							lazyLoad: 'ondemand',
							touchMove: false
						});
				};
			init();
		}//func
		_hiInit();
	})(jQuery);
      </script>
     </div>
     <div class="cms-cell first full" data-zone="WatchandShop" style="width:100.00000000000000000000000000%;">

      <!-- Brief:100746 -->

    margin-block-end: 2vh;
	font-size: 10vw;
	text-align: left;
	color: rgba(255,255,255,1);
}

	display: none;
}
.mobile a#watch-live {
    display: block;
    color: rgba(0,169,224,1);
    white-space: nowrap;
    text-align: center;
    border: 2px solid rgba(0,169,224,1);
    padding: 1% 0;
    font-weight: bolder;
    position: absolute;
    top: -20%;
    right: 0%;
    width: 50%;
    text-indent: 16px;
}
.mobile a#watch-live::before {
	content: '';
    display: inline-block;
    width: 18px;
    height: 18px;
    background: url(//img.hsni.com/images/prod/2019_rebrand/homepage/svg/playarrow.svg?v=7) 0 0 no-repeat;
    top: calc(50% - 9px);
    left: 16px;
    position: absolute;
}

	color: rgba(0,169,224,1);

	position: relative;
	top: auto; right: auto;

	text-align: left;

	font-size: 4.8vw;
	color: rgba(255,255,255,1);
}

	border-right: 2px solid rgba(255,255,255,1);
}
.mobile .on-air-now .player {
	width: 100%;
	margin: 0px 0px 12px 0px;
}
.mobile .on-air-now .player .oan-yt {
	transition: all .3s linear;
}
.mobile .on-air-now .player .oan-yt.mclosed {
	padding-bottom: 0;
	transition: all .3s linear;
}
.mobile .on-air-now .item {
	width: 100%;
	margin: 0%;
}
.mobile .on-air-now .item .image-span {
	display: block;
	width: 50%;
	vertical-align: top;
	background-color: rgba(0,0,0,1);
	margin: 0 auto;
}
.mobile .on-air-now .item .copy {
	display: inline-block;
	width: 48%;
	padding: 4% 0 0 4%;
	display: none;
}
.mobile .on-air-now .item .copy .topline {
	font-size: 4.8vw;
	color: rgba(255,255,255,1);
	display: block;
	margin: 0 0 2%;
}
.mobile .on-air-now .item .copy .price {
	font-size: 4.8vw;
	color: rgba(255,255,255,1);
}
.mobile .on-air-now .player::after {
    content: 'On Air Now';
    font-size: 6vw;
    font-family: isidoramedium;
    color: rgba(255,255,255,1);
    text-align: center;
    font-weight: bolder;
    letter-spacing: .025em;
    width: 100%;
    display: block;
    margin-top: 20px;
}
.mobile ._nav-outer {
	width: 36%;
    display: block;
}
.mobile .items-recently-aired {
	padding-bottom: 90%;
	border: 0px;
	margin-top: 0px;
	padding-top: 0px;
	width: 100%;
	float: none;
	clear: both;
	background: rgba(0,48,78,1);
}
.mobile .items-recently-aired .inner {
	padding: 3%;
}
.mobile .items-recently-aired .header {
	font-size: 6vw;
	font-family: isidoramedium;
	text-align: center;
	letter-spacing: .025em;
	color: rgba(255,255,255,1);
	margin: 0 0 3.6%;
}
.mobile .items-recently-aired .carousels {
	height: 50%;
	margin: 0 0 10%;
}
.mobile .items-recently-aired .carousels .carousel {
	background: rgba(0,48,78,1);
}
.mobile .items-recently-aired .carousels .controls {
	display: none;
}
.mobile .items-recently-aired .slide {
	padding: 5px;
}
.mobile .items-recently-aired .shop-all-buttons {
	position: relative;
	top: auto; 
	right: auto;
	width: auto;
}
.mobile .items-recently-aired .zButton.z2.active {
	display: none;
}
.mobile .items-recently-aired .zButton.z2.mobile.active {
	display: block;
}
.mobile .on-air-now .item .copy .zButton {
	line-height: 1;
    color: rgba(255,255,255,1);
    border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,1);
}
.mobile .items-recently-aired .zButton {
	line-height: 2.5em;
    color: rgba(0,169,224,1);
    border: 2px solid rgba(0,169,224,1);
}
.mobile .on-air-now .item .copy .zButton,
.mobile .items-recently-aired .zButton {
	background-color: transparent;
	text-align: center;
	font-size: 4.8vw;
	font-family: IsidoraMedium;
	font-weight: bolder;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 1299px) and (min-width: 768px) {
	body:not(.mobile) #oan-ira-section {
		margin: 0 !important;
		}
}
      </style>
      <section id="oan-ira-section">
       <div class="on-air-now">
        <div class="inner">
         <h2 class="header">
          Watch &amp; Shop
         </h2>
         <div class="nav">
          <nav>
           <ul class="_nav-outer">
            <li>
             <a class="z1 active" data-toggle=".z1" id="hsn-live">
              HSN
             </a>
            </li>
            <li>
             <a class="z2" data-toggle=".z2" id="hsn2-live">
              HSN2
             </a>
            </li>
           </ul>
          </nav>
          <a id="watch-live">
           Watch live
          </a>
         </div>
         <div class="player">
          <div class="_hp2018_hsn_livestream oan-yt mclosed _resp-container z1 active">
           <div aria-labelledby="HSN Live Stream" data-yt-id="1ph8qQnjXts" id="hsn-stream">
           </div>
           <span class="yt-ov-msg">
            If you are experiencing video playback issues, you may need to upgrade your browser, or use Chrome or Firefox.
           </span>
          </div>
          <div class="_hp2018_hsn2_livestream oan-yt mclosed _resp-container z2">
           <div aria-labelledby="HSN2 Live Stream" data-yt-id="R9XAHkBMd6A" id="hsn2-stream">
           </div>
           <span class="yt-ov-msg">
            If you are experiencing video playback issues, you may need to upgrade your browser, or use Chrome or Firefox.
           </span>
          </div>
         </div>
         <a class="item z1 active product-detail-modal" href="#">
         </a>
         <a class="item z2 product-detail-modal" href="#">
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="items-recently-aired">
        <div class="inner">
         <h2 class="header">
          Items Recently Aired
         </h2>
         <div class="carousels">
          <div class="carousel z1 active">
           <div class="controls">
           </div>
           <div class="_carousel">
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="carousel z2 active">
           <div class="controls">
           </div>
           <div class="_carousel">
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="clear">
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="shop-all-buttons">
          <a class="zButton z1 active" href="/shop/on-air-today/6882/" manual_cm_re="recommendations-_-hsnitemsrecentlyaired-_-shopall">
           Shop All
          </a>
          <a class="zButton z2" href="/watch/items-recently-aired/" manual_cm_re="recommendations-_-hsn2itemsrecentlyaired-_-shopall">
           Shop All
          </a>
          <a class="zButton z2 mobile" href="/watch/live?network=4" manual_cm_re="recommendations-_-hsn2itemsrecentlyaired-_-shopall">
           Shop All
          </a>

      <script async="" src="https://www.youtube.com/iframe_api">
      </script>
      <script>
       (function($){
	// Carousel array
	window._iraCC = [];
	
	var isMobile = !!$('body').is('.mobile')
	var device = JSON.parse($('script.device-information').html());
	
	if(isMobile) {
		$('.shop-all-buttons a').each(function(index) {
    		$(this).html('Shop all items recently aired');
		});
	}
	
	if (window.location.href.indexOf('keynote=true') > -1) {
		$('#oan-ira-section').hide();
	}
	
	if(window.location.href.indexOf('keynote=true') <= -1) {
		$(window).on('load', function() {
			$('#YouTubeVideoPlayer').show();
		});
	}
	
	// IE11 / Windows 7 Video Fix
	var isIE11 = !!window.MSInputMethodContext && !!document.documentMode;
	if (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('Windows NT 6.1') !=-1 && (isIE11 == true)) {
	   $('.yt-ov-msg').show();
	}
	
	// jquery plugin for checking if an element is in the viewport
	$.fn.onscreen = function() {
		var top = $(this).offset().top,
			bottom = top + $(this).outerHeight(),
			vTop = $(window).scrollTop(),
			vBottom = vTop + $(window).height();
		return bottom > vTop && top < vBottom;
	};
	
	// nav clicks
	$('#oan-ira-section ._nav-outer').on('click', 'a:not(.active)',function(ev) {
		ev.preventDefault();
		var cur = $(this);
		
		//toggle playing of videos, start playing the other one
		//-do this before adding the active class so the state change event listener does not try to flag this as a user event
		$('.oan-yt').each(function(){
			var inCur = $(this);
			var player = inCur.data('oan-player');
			
			if (!player) {
				return true;
			}
			
			switch(true){
				//if this is not mobile and the user did not stop the video previously and this is the video that is about to be on the screen, play it
				case(!isMobile && !player.__noplay && !inCur.hasClass('active')):
					player.playVideo();
				break;
				//else this is the other video, pause
				case(!!inCur.hasClass('active')):
					player.pauseVideo();
				break;
			}
		});
		
		// Toggle Visibility
		var newActive = cur.data('toggle');
		$('#oan-ira-section .z1, #oan-ira-section .z2').removeClass('active').filter(newActive).addClass('active');
		
		return false;
	});
	
	//Toggle visibility of player on mobile
	$('#watch-live').on('click', function() {
		$('.oan-yt').toggleClass('mclosed');
	});
	
	function recentInit(obj) {
		(typeof(obj) != 'object') ? obj = {} : '';
		
		// Ajax call to get items
		$.ajax({
			url: '/api/product/feeds/'+obj.feed,
			type: 'GET',
			data: { take:13 },
			beforeSend: function (xhr) {
				xhr.setRequestHeader('X-Requested-With', { toString: function() { return ''; } } );
			},
			success: function(data,ts,xhr){
				var v = data.Products.Products.shift(),
					container = obj.carousel,
					url = v.ProductLink.Uri.replace(/http(s)*:\/\/.*hsn\.(com|net)/,''),
					mobile = !!$('body').is('.mobile'),
					recipe = (!!mobile && 'prodgrid') || 'prodfull',
					recipeGrid = (!!mobile && 'prodcar') || 'prodgrid';
				
				var cm = "recommendations-_-" + obj.cm2 + "-_-product_" + v.Identity;
				
				var cur = obj.oan;
				
				cur.html('');
				
				cur.attr("href", url)
					.attr("data-preview-url", url)
					.attr("data-product-id", v.Identity)
					.attr("manual_cm_re", cm)
					.attr("manual_cm_sp", cm)
				
				var img = $('<img alt="' + v.Topline +'" class="image" src="' + v.ImageLink.Uri.replace("#RECIPE#", recipe) + '" >');
				var imgSpan = $('<span class="image-span" />');
				imgSpan.append(img)
				
				var copy = $('<div class="copy" />')
					.append( $('<div class="topline" />')
						.html(v.TopLine)
					)
					.append( $('<div class="price" />')
						.html(v.Pricing.Tier1)
					)
					.append( $('<div class="old-price" />')
						.html(v.Pricing.Tier2)
					)
					.append( $('<div class="zButton" />').text('Shop Now') );
				
				cur.append(imgSpan).append(copy);
				
				// Put the remaining products into the carousel
				$.each(data.Products.Products, function(i,v) {
					var prevUrl = v.ProductLink.Uri.replace(/http(s)*:\/\/.*hsn\.(com|net)/,'');
					var cm = 'recommendations-_-' + obj.cm2 + '-_-product_' + v.Identity;
					var topline = v.TopLine.replace(/"/g, '&quot;');
					
					var slide = $('<a class="product-detail-modal slide" href="' + prevUrl + '" />')
						.attr('manual_cm_re', cm)
						.attr('manual_cm_sp', cm)
						.attr('data-preview-url', prevUrl)
						.attr('data-product-id', v.Identity);
					
					slide.append( $('<span class="image-span">' )
						.append( $('<img class="image">' )
							.attr('src', v.ImageLink.Uri.replace("#RECIPE#", recipeGrid))
							.attr('alt', topline)
							.attr('title', topline)
						)
					);
					
					container.append(slide);
				});
				
				window._iraCC.push(container);
				
				container
					.on('init', function(event, slick){
						// We start with both visible so slick can capture width and render correctly, then hide the 2nd one
						$('.items-recently-aired .carousels .carousel.z2').removeClass('active');
					})
					.slick({
						initialSlide: 0,
						arrows: true,
						appendArrows: obj.controls,
						infinite: false,
						responsive: [{
							breakpoint: 5000,
							settings: {
								slidesToShow: mobile ? 2.4 : 2,
								slidesToScroll: mobile ? 2 : 2
							}
						},
						{
							breakpoint: 1299,
							settings: {
								slidesToShow: mobile ? 2.4 : 2,
								slidesToScroll: mobile ? 2 : 2
							}
						}]
					});
			}
		});
	}
	
	$(document).ready(function(){
		//init hsn feed
		recentInit({
			feed: 'RecentlyOnAirNow1',
			carousel: $('.items-recently-aired .carousel.z1 ._carousel'),
			oan: $('.on-air-now .item.z1'),
			cm2: 'hsnitemsrecentlyaired',
			controls: '.items-recently-aired .carousel.z1 .controls'
		});
		//init hsn2 feed
		recentInit({
			feed: 'RecentlyOnAirNow4',
			carousel: $('.items-recently-aired .carousel.z2 ._carousel'),
			oan: $('.on-air-now .item.z2'),
			cm2: 'hsn2itemsrecentlyaired',
			controls: '.items-recently-aired .carousel.z2 .controls'
		});
	});
	
	//youtube player control
	window.onYouTubeIframeAPIReady = function() {
		//create the yt players
		$.each($('.oan-yt > div'),function(i,v){
			$(v).parent().data('oan-player', new YT.Player($(v).attr('id'), {
				videoId: $(v).attr('data-yt-id'),
				playerVars: {
					controls: 1,
					showinfo: 1,
					modestbranding: 1,
					fs: 1,
					cc_load_policy: 1,
					iv_load_policy: 3,
					autohide: 1,
					mute: 1,
					rel: 0,
					origin: 'https%3A%2F%2Fwww.hsn.com'
				},
				events: {
					onStateChange: function(ev){
						//if the active player state changes and it's on screen, then it's likely that the user changed it, if the user paused it, the video should not play again automatically when scrolling back into view or navigating the tabs, otherwise if the user hit play, resume normal behavior
						if(!!$(ev.target.a).onscreen() && !!$(ev.target.a).parent().hasClass('active')){
							$(ev.target.a).parent().data('oan-player').__noplay = (ev.data == YT.PlayerState.PAUSED);
						}
					},
					onReady: function(ev) {
						//if it's not a tablet app and not mobile, play then pause the video so the poster does not show
						//-tablet apps have a touchstart event instead
						if(!(device.IsTablet && device.IsNativeApp)){
							if(!device.IsMobile){
								//ev.target.playVideo();
								//ev.target.pauseVideo();
							}
							//call the scroll event so that the video starts playing if it's in the viewport
							$(window).trigger('scroll._oan-yt');
						}
					}
				}
			}));
		});
		
		var _scroll = function(ev){
			var p = $('.oan-yt.active'), d = p.data('oan-player') || {};
			//if the video has been initialized
			if(typeof(d.playVideo) == 'function'){
				switch(true){
					//if this is not mobile and the user did not stop the video previously and the video is on screen and not playing, play it
					case(d.getPlayerState() != YT.PlayerState.PLAYING && !isMobile && !d.__noplay && !!p.onscreen()):
						d.playVideo();
					break;
					//if the video is muted and playing and not on screen, pause the video
					case(d.getPlayerState() == YT.PlayerState.PLAYING && d.isMuted() && !p.onscreen()):
						d.pauseVideo();
					break;
				}
			}
		};
		
		// on tablet apps, attach one touchstart event to window so that the video starts playing if the user happens to touch the element while scrolling, which is about 30% likely
		if(!!device.IsTablet && !!device.IsNativeApp){
			$(window).one('touchstart._oan-yt', _scroll);
		}
		
		// attach a scroll event to play/pause the active player when it's on/off the viewport
		$(window).on('resize._oan-yt scroll._oan-yt', _scroll);
	};
})(jQuery);
      </script>
     </div>
     <div class="cms-cell first full" data-zone="Zone27" style="width:100.00000000000000000000000000%;">
      <!-- Brief:102473-1 -->
      <!-- Brief:102473 -->

      <div br="102473" class="_mosaic_mc _102473" u="DG47273">
       <picture>
        <source g="1" media="(min-width: 667px)" srcset="//i02.hsncdn.com/tablet/DG47273_image_background_d.jpg" t="reg">
         <source g="2" media="(max-width: 667px)" srcset="//i02.hsncdn.com/desktop/DG47273_background_m.jpg?v=7" t="reg">

         </source>
        </source>
       </picture>
       <div class="_hdrimg">
        <a g="4" href="/shop/new-fashion/fa-19337" manual_cm_re="mosaic-_-springfakickoff-_-shopall" t="reg">
        </a>
        <picture>
         <source g="1" media="(max-width: 667px)" srcset="https://images.hsn.com/images/prod/2021/svg/DG47155_lockup_m.svg?v=7" t="reg">
          <img alt="Spring Fashion" g="3" src="//images.hsn.com/images/prod/2021/svg/DG47273_lockup_d.svg?v=7" t="reg"/>
         </source>
        </picture>
       </div>
       <div class="_mosaic_hc">
        <a g="4" href="/shop/new-fashion/fa-19337" manual_cm_re="mosaic-_-springfakickoff-_-shopall" t="reg">

        <span g="4" t="cl1">

        <span g="4" t="cl2">
         Staying in or standing out. Find fabulous new looks for everywhere you go.
        </span>
        <button class="_cta" g="4" t="cl3">
        </button>
       </div>
       <div class="_mosaic_scon">
        <div class="_slider">
         <div class="_cs1 _contentstory">
          <a g="11" href="/shop/the-new-comfy/20337" manual_cm_re="mosaic-_-springfakickoff-_-newcomfy" t="reg">
          </a>
          <img alt="Woman in comfy clothes" g="11" src="//i01.hsncdn.com/desktop/DG47273_image_1_d.jpg?v=7" t="reg"/>
          <div class="__promo">
           <span class="_copy" g="11" t="cl1">

           </span>

      <div class="_must-shop _v _up _exp-cc" id="Must-Shop">
       <div class="_outer">
        <div class="_header">
         <span>
          Must-Shop Shows
         </span>
         <a href="/watch/program-guide" manual_cm_re="carousel-_-must-shop-_-ProgramGuide">
          Program Guide
         </a>
        </div>
        <div class="_controls">
        </div>
        <div class="_inner">
         <div class="_item-data">
          <div class="_item-c">
           <div class="_item">
            <a>
            </a>
            <img alt="     " src=""/>

      <script>
       $(document).ready(function($){
  var isMobile = !!$('body').is('.mobile'),
    //get current date
    date = new Date(),
    //determine current day of the week
    day = date.getDay(),
    //var for storing current day
    _day = day,
    //carousel
    _cc = $('._exp-cc ._inner'),
    //pager
    _pager = $('._exp-cc ._pager'),
    //clone of hidden item data element
    _clone = $('._exp-cc ._item-data ._item-c').clone(),
    device = (isMobile) ? 'phone' : 'desktop',
	products = {
		  1: {
			  day: 1,
			  link: ['/shop/good-eating-with-marlo-smith/19406'],
			  info: [
				  ['Good Eating with Marlo Smith'],
				  ['Mondays at 5pm ET']
			  ],
			  metric: ['GoodEatingwithMarloSmith'],
			  image: ['goodeating.jpg']
		  },
		  2: {
			  day: 1,
			  link: ['/shop/adams-open-house/20014'],
			  info: [
				  ['Adam\'s Open House'],
				  ['Mondays at 9pm ET']
			  ],
			  metric: ['AdamsOpenHouseWithAdamFreeman'],
			  image: ['adamsopenhouse.jpg']
		  },
		  3: {
			  day: 2,
			  link: ['/shop/welcome-home-with-alyce/20083'],
			  info: [
				  ['Welcome Home with Alyce'],
				  ['Tuesdays at 10am ET']
			  ],
			  metric: ['WelcomeHomewithAlyce'],
			  image: ['WelcomeHome.jpg']
		  },
		  4: {
			  day: 2,
			  link: ['/shop/suzanne-gets-crafty/20726'],
			  info: [
				  ['Suzanne Gets Crafty'],
				  ['Tuesdays at 7pm ET']
			  ],
			  metric: ['SuzanneGetsCrafty'],
			  image: ['SuzanneGetsCrafty_MustShopShow']
		  },
		  5: {
			  day: 3,
			  link: ['/shop/your-go-to-diy-guy/20870'],
			  info: [
				  ['Your Go-To DIY Guy'],
				  ['Wednesdays at 7am ET']
			  ],
			  metric: ['DIYGuy'],
			  image: ['DIYGuy.jpg']
		  },
		  6: {
			  day: 3,
			  link: ['/shop/wake-up-beautiful/20068'],
			  info: [
				  ['Wake Up Beautiful with Valerie'],
				  ['Wednesdays at 9am ET']
			  ],
			  metric: ['WakeUpBeautiful'],
			  image: ['WakeUpBeautiful.jpg']
		  },
		  7: {
			  day: 3,
			  link: ['/shop/beauty-report/9163'],
			  info: [
				  ['The Beauty Report with Amy Morrison'],
				  ['Wednesdays at 9pm ET']
			  ],
			  metric: ['TheBeautyReportwithAmyMorrison'],
			  image: ['beautyreport.jpg']
		  },
		  8: {
			  day: 4,
			  link: ['/shop/obsessed-with-style/20015'],
			  info: [
				  ['Obsessed with Style with Debbie D'],
				  ['Thursdays at 7am ET']
			  ],
			  metric: ['ObsessedWithStyle'],
			  image: ['image_HP_mustshopshow_V2.jpg']
		  },
		  9: {
			  day: 4,
			  link: ['/shop/the-list-with-colleen-lopez/12107'],
			  info: [
				  ['The List with Colleen Lopez'],
				  ['Thursdays at 9pm ET']
			  ],
			  metric: ['TheListwithColleenLopez'],
			  image: ['thelist.jpg']
		  },
		  10: {
			  day: 5,
			  link: ['/shop/shannons-in-the-house/20252'],
			  info: [
				  ['Shannon\'s In The House'],
				  ['Fridays at 7pm ET']
			  ],
			  metric: ['ShannonInTheHouse'],
			  image: ['ShannonInTheHouse.jpg']
		  },
		  11: {
			  day: 5,
			  link: ['/shop/diane-gilman/88'],
			  info: [
				  ['Fashion Fridays with DG2 by Diane Gilman'],
				  ['Fridays at 9pm ET']
			  ],
			  metric: ['fashionfridaysdg2'],
			  image: ['FashionFridayswithDG2.jpg']
		  },
		  12: {
			  day: 6,
			  link: ['/shop/now-thats-clever-with-guy/19986'],
			  info: [
				  ['Now That\'s Clever with Guy'],
				  ['Saturdays at 7am ET']
			  ],
			  metric: ['NowThatsCleverWithGuyYovan'],
			  image: ['nowthatsclever.jpg']
		  },
		  13: {
			  day: 6,
			  link: ['/shop/saturday-morning/19251'],
			  info: [
				  ['Saturday Morning with Callie and Alyce'],
				  ['Saturdays at 10am ET']
			  ],
			  metric: ['SaturdayMorning'],
			  image: ['SE_MustShopShows_SatMorning']
		  },
		  14: {
			  day: 6,
			  link: ['/shop/shopping-with-colleen/19610'],
			  info: [
				  ['Shopping with Colleen'],
				  ['Saturdays at 12pm ET']
			  ],
			  metric: ['ShoppingWithColleen'],
			  image: ['shoppingwithcolleen_July2019.jpg']
		  }
	  }
      
    //create the carousel if it is not already initialized
    _doCarousel = function(){
      //if cc is not init
      if(!_cc.hasClass('slick-initialized')){
        _drawItems(day);
      }
    },  //doCarousel
    
    //draw the carousel items
    _drawItems = function(){
      var track = 'carousel-_-must-shop-_-', cm = 'manual_cm_re', html = '', img = {}, __clone;
      
      $.each(products,function(i,p)  {

        img[0] = (p.info[0][0] != '') || '';

        __clone = _clone.clone()

          .find('._item:first a').attr('href', p.link[0]).end()
          .find('._item:first a').attr(cm, track+p.metric[0]).end()
          .find('._item:first img').attr('src','//i01.hsncdn.com/'+device+'/DG77777_'+p.image[0]+'?v=77').attr('alt',p.info[0][0]).end()
          .find('._item:first span:first').html(p.info[0][0]).end()
          .find('._item:first span:last').html(p.info[1][0]).end()

          .appendTo(_cc);
        
      });
      
      _cc.find('._item-data').remove();
      
      window.__cc = _cc;
    if(!Object.keys(products).find(function(key){ return products[key].day === day})){
      startSlide = Object.keys(products).find(function(key){ return products[key].day === day + 1});
    } else {
      startSlide = Object.keys(products).find(function(key){ return products[key].day === day});
    }
      //set up carousel
      _cc.slick({
        arrows:true,
        lazyLoad:'ondemand',
        swipeToSlide: Modernizr.touchevents,
        slidesToShow: (!!isMobile && 1) || 2,
        slidesToScroll: (!!isMobile && 1) || 1,
        infinite: true,
        dots: true,
        initialSlide: startSlide,
        appendDots:_pager,
    focusOnSelect: false
      });

    };  //drawItems

  //create the carousel, sending the current day, which will become the initial slide
  $(document).ready(function(){
    _doCarousel(_day);
  $(__cc).on('mouseover',function(){
    __cc.slick('slickGoTo', __cc.slick('slickCurrentSlide'))
    $(__cc).unbind('mouseover')
    })
  });
});
      </script>
     </div>
     <div class="cms-cell first full" data-zone="Zone29" style="width:100.00000000000000000000000000%;">
      <!-- Brief:101584-1 -->
      <!-- Brief:101584 -->
      <style>
       a, a:hover {text-decoration: none!important; }
	._101584-mc {
		background-color: rgba(255,255,255,1);
	}
	.mobile ._101584-mc {
		margin-bottom: 0;
	}
	body:not(.appTablet) ._101584-mc { margin-top: 0; }
	._101584-mc a { color: #00304e; text-decoration: none; }
	._101584-mc ._r {
		display: block;
		background-color: #fff;
		font-size: 0;
		text-align: center;
	}
	._101584-mc ._tl,._101584-mc ._sa a { font-size: 12px; }
	._101584-mc ._tl > span {
		font-family: IsidoraSemibold;
		font-size: 19px;
		line-height: 2;
		color: rgba(0,48,78,1);
		letter-spacing:0.025em;
	}
	@media screen and (min-width: 1300px) {
		._101584-mc ._tl > span {
			font-size: 25px;
		}
	}
	.mobile ._101584-mc ._tl {
		padding: 4px;
	}
	.mobile ._101584-mc ._tl > span {
		line-height: 1.3;
	}
	.appTablet ._101584-mc ._tl > span { font-size: 2.5vw; }
	/*._101584-mc ._tl > span > span { color: rgba(255,255,255,1); }*/
	._101584-mc ._br { padding: 0 2% 3%; }
	.mobile ._101584-mc ._br { margin-top: -1px; }
	._101584-mc ._br a {
		padding: 2%;
	}
	._101584-mc ._br a::before {
		content: "";
		height: 0;
		padding-bottom: 50%;
		width: 0;
		display: inline-block;
		vertical-align: middle;
	}
	._101584-mc ._br img {
		display: inline-block;
		width: 100%;
		vertical-align: middle;
	}
	._101584-mc ._br a {
		display: inline-block;
		position: relative;
		width: 25%;	
	}
	.mobile ._101584-mc ._br a {
		width: 50%;
	}
	._101584-mc ._sa { margin-top: 1.5%; }
	._101584-mc ._sa a {
		display: inline-block;
		position: relative;
		width: 33.333%;
	}
	._101584-mc ._sa span {
		font-family: IsidoraMedium;
		letter-spacing:.025em;

	}

        display: block;

    footer .footer-outer .email-signup-container .signup-confirm-email[style^="display: inline-block"]~label,

        position: relative;

    footer .footer-outer .email-signup-container > form > div { position: relative; margin-top: 6%; }

        width: 100%

    footer .footer-outer .email-signup-container input.input-validation-error {

        border-right: none !important;
        border-top: none !important;

       <a g="2" href="https://www.hsn.com/shop/flexpay/6849" manual_cm_re="global-_-footer-_-flexpay" t="">
        <span class="cl1">

         3 or more FlexPay on everything*
         <br/>
         Enjoy now. Pay over time. 0% interest.
        </span>
       </a>
      </div>
      <div class="top-cell" style="">
       <a href="https://www.hsn.com/faqs?faqId=2352" manual_cm_re="global-_-footer-_-returns">
        <span class="cl1">
         30-DAY
         <span>
          RETURNS
         </span>
        </span>
        <span class="cl2">
         We test every product and want you to love what you buy. But, if you don't, just send it back. You can return most items within 30 days.
        </span>
       </a>
      </div>
